BranchType.description: What kind of branch to use.

WindHorzAngle.description: The angle of the wind that blows against this tree's leaves while the wind is blowing horizontally.

WindHorzAngleCycle.description: How long the wind blows horizontally, before blowing vertically instead.

WindVertAngle.description: The angle of the wind that blows against this tree's leaves while the wind is blowing vertically.

WindVertAngleCycle.description: How long the wind blows vertically, before blowing horizontally instead.

WindSpeedMin.description: The minimum speed of the wind which blows against this tree's leaves.

WindSpeedMax.description: The maximum speed of the wind which blows against this tree's leaves.

WindSpeedCycle.description: How long the wind blows at one speed before picking another random speed in-between WindSpeedMin and WindSpeedMax.
